import classes from './MealItem.module.css' import MealItemForm from './MealItemForm' import {useContext} from 'react' import cartContext from '../../../store/cart-context' const MealItem=(props)=>{ const cartCtx= useContext(cartContext) const price=`$${props.price.toFixed(2)}` const addToCartHandler=(amount)=>{ cart } return

  • {props.name}

    {props.description}
    {price}
    • } export default MealItem;
